title: Decision Making Masterclass
description: A comprehensive course on operational decision-making under various conditions. Covers decision types, models, biases, time pressure, team decisions, and post-decision analysis. Designed for operators and supervisors making critical decisions in high-reliability environments.
learningObjectives: Understand different decision types and match approach to situation
Apply decision models appropriate to time and stakes
Make effective decisions under time pressure
Learn from decisions through structured analysis
